title: Vegan Sausage Rolls Now Available!
body: We have partnered with Quorn to bring you meat-free vegan and veterinarian friendly sausage rolls for the low low cost of just £1!

title: Special Offer on XBOX!
body: Today only, buy 50 Xbox's and get your 51st one free!

title: Jumpers are now 20% off!
body: It is cold cold cold in cold Britannia, thus we now offer 20% off all jumpers when you spend £50 or more!

title: 4 for 3
body: Buy 3 sasuage rolls and get your fourth one absolutely free!

title: Nintendo Switch
body: The Nintendo switch has been released, now available at GAME for the low low cost of £250!
